articles.title: India drop four places, Australia gain one in latest FIFA rankings after AFC Asian Cup 2023 clash - Khel Now
articles.description: The Indian Football Team conceded four positions in the latest FIFA rankings following their defeat to Australia in Group B opener at the AFC Asian Cup 2023.
articles.content: The AFC Asian Cup 2023 is well and truly underway. After the opening clash, India and Australia went up against each other in the Group B curtain-raiser. The match ended 2-0 in favour of the Socceroo… [+1792 chars]
